programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep315
programme.desc: Tracker Joins the Pups! - Ryder and the pups are on their way to the jungle to help Carlos move a massive relic to the museum when he falls into a deep pit. Carlos is saved by a big eared pup named Tracker. For his bravery Tracker is made an honorary member of the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep322
programme.desc: The Pups Winter Wonder Show - The Adventure Bay Snow-Show is in trouble when Mayor Humdinger escapes with the feature act: Capn Turbots performing penguins. Its up to the Paw Patrol, with the help of Tracker, to save the day so that the show can go on!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep323
programme.desc: Goldie the Fish - Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep119
programme.desc: The Collection - Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. The others have all one sticks, bubbles, sounds, tools. They help Anna to find her memories with her friends

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Fixing Things - Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep302
programme.desc: Blue's Dino Clues - It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep811
programme.desc: Pups vs. A Neon Humdinger / Pups Save A Royal Painting - When Mayor Humdinger's giant neon sign of himself gets loose, the Paw Patrol must stop it from rolling through town. // Sweetie steals a painting of the Princess and attempts to replace it with one of herself.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep312
programme.desc: Pups Save a School Bus - When all the tires on the Adventure Bay school bus blow out, Ryder volunteers to use the Paw Patroller as a substitute school bus.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep114
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom - With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. // As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: Deer Squad S3 Ep304
programme.desc: The Secret Island / Astrobot - Lady Fluffpot visits a secret island with Steel to find a birthday present from her cousin Adventure Alex. // Muffin's plan to get Dinobot into trouble goes disastrously wrong when the pair get trapped with Lola in an out-of-control Space Shuttle.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep305
programme.desc: Paddington Meets Paddingtron/Paddington's First Diwali - Paddington builds a robot called PaddingTron that requires a real friend to work. // Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him and Paddington is his helpful assistant, but will they both get to enjoy the fireworks finale?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep312
programme.desc: Pups Save the Songbirds - When the famous singing songbirds of Adventure Bay go missing, it's PAW Patrol to the rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep425
programme.desc: Pups Save Baby Humdinger / Pups Save a Pinata - Tracker has a dream that Mayor Humginder turns into a baby! Now it's up to the pups to find the special coconuut to reverse the spell. // Alex is hosting a fun party in Adventure Bay but is heartbroken when his special pinata mysteriously disappears.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep115
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A School / The Crew Builds A Waterway - It's the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! / The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoe's crops and to keep Crunchy the beaver from taking all the water!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Turtle's Shell Day / The Way of the Gran-Gran / The Spring Kick-off Games - Bossy plans a Shell Day party for Turtle without considering what Turtle wants. // Bossy and Turtle learn how to be patient from the Master. // Gran-Gran; Bossy is tired of losing at the Spring Kickoff Games.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up / Deep Goo Sea - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. // William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Finceaera - Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep209
programme.desc: The Lost Girl in a Canoe - The crew meet a Chamorro girl with a broken canoe who has been magically transported to their ocean.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep316
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep318
programme.desc: Rongisit - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep320
programme.desc: Talent Day - It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep321
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon - Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep322
programme.desc: Grandpa at the Playground - Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens - Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep616

programme.desc: Dokumentari mengenai "kraf tour" di tiga daerah di Utara dan Pantai Barat Sabah, iaitu Kudat, Kota Belud dan Tuaran. Dokumentari ini juga akan membawa penonton untuk mengenali lebih dekat etnik Rungus di Kudat, Bajau Samah dan Irranun di Kota Belud dan Dusun Lotud di Tuaran yang meneruskan pembuatan kraftangan peninggalan nenek moyang mereka sehingga berjaya menjadi usahawan kraf di bawah Kraftangan Malaysia.

programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - In India the Modi Government is being accused of waging a war on Bollywood, the country's most powerful cultural force. Filmmakers who criticise the government or resist pressure to produce pro-Hindu content face a backlash.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep4

programme.title: Australian Story Ep32
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - With little more than a briefcase full of old photos for clues, comedian and co-host of China Tonight Annie Louey unravels decades-old secrets in a bid to understand who her father really was.

programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - This summer, we bring you more of our favourite Landline stories from 2023. How the destruction of millions of bees has affected farmers; and reflecting on a life on one of Australia's most famous outback cattle stations.

programme.title: What Broke The Rental Market?
programme.desc: As the cost of living goes up, nothing looms larger in our budgets than the roof over our heads. Casey Briggs looks at what an average wage gets you in some of the world's big cities, and lessons for our rental crisis.

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep9

programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - David Speers presents Australia's premier daily current affairs show, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account.

programme.title: The World Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Landline Summer Ep21
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - This summer, we bring you more of our favourite Landline stories from 2023. A new plantation model for forestry on the Tiwi Islands; and private properties open their gates to farm camping.

programme.title: The Cloud Under The Sea
programme.desc: Lurking under the sea is a global web of fibre optic telecommunication cables, the plumbing of the internet. It's how we talk, text and stream, connecting billions of people. These cables are also the frontline of a tech war.

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Michael Rowland and Bridget Brennan bring you news and interviews, joined by Emma Rebellato, Rani Hayman and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - When big stories break, turn to Ruby Cornish in the morning to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The leading news at lunchtime. Gemma Veness brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: The Grid: Powering the Future - A Catalyst Special Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 22 - Dr. Niraj Lal meets the Australians leading the biggest change to the electricity grid in a century: the rise of renewable energy. Along the way he explores new technologies keeping the power on now and in the future.

programme.title: Great Australian Stuff Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Hosted by Tony Armstrong this series uncovers surprising stories behind some of our most iconic Australian stuff. This episode looks at food including classics like the meat pie, Macadamia nut, Chiko Roll and Vegemite.

programme.title: Adam and Poh's Great Australian Bites Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - To get to know a country, you have to know its food. A nation's cuisine reflects its climate, its history, its creativity and its heart. Our culinary adventure starts at the top of one of the most fascinating countries.

programme.title: Heywire Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Heywire winner Ceobahn has always felt a deep connection with the outback. Now she's part of a team of Indigenous rangers and ecologists managing land at Calperum Station.

programme.title: Compass Ep24
programme.desc: Sr. 37 - The Uniting Church faces change with the appointment of a new moderator, Reverend Mata Hiliau, the first Tongan woman in this role. But what obstacles does the Rev Mata face from within her own community and the wider church?

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Chris and Belinda bought the land next door to their existing house, just 3.9 metres wide: a tiny gap in a long row of heritage listed cottages in Sydney's Forest Lodge. They plan to build a uniquely sustainable house.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - We meet a vegan chef who highlights texture and flavour in her plant-only cooking, and whose garden became a refuge during recent ill-health.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep12
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Stephanie Borys.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Ernie explores the ancient forests and shifting sand dunes of Pemberton, Bianca breaks into the drag queen scene of Broken Hill and Aaron's language and dance is put to the test back home in Bamaga.

programme.title: Planet America: Fireside Chat Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Chas and John are back by the fake fireplace in the fauv-val Office to take a deeper look at the 2024 Presidential race and the week's news in the US. There's only days until the first in the nation Iowa Caucus. (Return)

programme.title: If You're Listening Ep20
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - China's pandas are not just pandas. They're diplomats. In recent years China has been hostile toward the West, with the most literal symbol of their displeasure being the withdrawal of their pandas from zoos around the world.

programme.title: China Tonight: Summer Special Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - In this summer special of China Tonight, Sam Yang and Annie Louey take a look at the historical events that have shaped one of the most fascinating and complex countries in the world.

programme.title: The World Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep17
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - In Canada Australian firefighters join an international team in a desperate battle to help combat the nation's worst forest fires in recorded history. An area of 32 million acres has been scorched in this climate catastrophe.

programme.title: Aussie Bull Catchers Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - When Kurt ignores the advice of his team, his muster begins to look shaky. On the cusp of completing their biggest job, Liz leads them to the finish line. Clarry is determined to meet the cattle target for his new clients.

programme.title: The Business: Summer Special Ep181
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Where is Australia at on the road to net zero? In this special summer episode of The Business, Kirsten Aiken looks back at some of the biggest renewables and green energy stories of 2023.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know the latest on the day's top stories, as Jade Barker brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Strickland Vs. Magomedov
programme.desc: Prelims - After a spectacular UFC debut that saw him end Dustin Stoltzfus night in just 19 seconds, Abus Magomedov will step squarely into the main event spotlight on July 1 when he faces perennial middleweight contender Sean Strickland in the headliner of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. A Top 10 stalwart fighting in his adopted hometown, Strickland has already won three UFC main events over Uriah Hall, Jack Hermansson and Nassourdine Imavov, and now hell look to halt the rise of Magomedov, who brings a three-fight winning streak into this intriguing bout.

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds
